name: King Of Mazes
description: “King of Mazes” is an adult comedic harem RPG. Go on a quest like none other and save the kingdom of it’s unique and strange problems by thinking out of the box and using your problem-solving skills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
